ISSUE.TITLE: Bulk import URL path is incorrect
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Deployment Type Self-hosted ### NetBox Version v4.2.8 ### Python Version 3.10 ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Navigate to the bulk import view for any object type (e.g. sites). ### Expected Behavior The URL should end in `/import/` (e.g. `/dcim/sites/import/`). ### Observed Behavior The URL ends with `/bulk_import/` (the view name). I believe this is an inadvertent change from #17752, which was implemented in v4.2.0. Each of the bulk import views should specify a `path` similar to the bulk edit & bulk delete views: ```python @register_model_view(Site, 'bulk_import', path='import', detail=False) class SiteBulkImportView(generic.BulkImportView): ... ```

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixes #19322: Correct URL paths for bulk import views
Fixes #19322: Correct URL paths for bulk import views (#19323)
